Coding

May 2017

Gtools

Faster (3-50x) implementation of collapse, pctile, xtile, contract, egen, isid, levelsof, distinct, and more using C plugins.

... ...

June 2017

alogit

I helped code the alogit stata command to estimate the model detailed by Abaluck and Adams' working paper, 'What Do Consumers Consider Before They Choose? Identification from Asymmetric Demand Responses'


Feb 2016

Stata Power

Personal notes and Stata programs to aid in power analysis (parametric and simulation; clustering and stratification).

... ...

Juy 2015

Tablefill

Fill in LyX and LaTeX tables using a placeholder system.

... ...


I rather like coding and it's proved to be a somewhat useful hobby. I keep all my projects in my github page, and feedback is always welcome!


Other Stata Projects

  • stata-benchmark: Simple hack to benchmark (time) Stata programs.
  • stata-todatetime: Simple wrapper to convert Stata strings to date-time.
  • stata-matrix-tools: Various utilities to work with Stata matrices.

Other Interesting Projects

  • gmail-download: Download and sort all gmail e-mails into various formats using the Gmail API.
  • gre-cli-words: Show a random GRE vocab word in the command line.
  • highlight-sas-stata: Various implementations highlighting SAS and Stata (pygments, listings, highlight.js)
